DOC.brief_summary: 30,000 individual live Aarhus County , Denmark Oct 1997 randomize two group . The intervention group receive invitation test urogenital Chlamydia trachomatis use home-obtained mailed sample ( 9,000 individual ) . The control group receive intervention ( 21,000 individual ) . Outcome measure : Number test individual , number detect infection , number woman develop PID , ectopic pregnancy infertility , number woman give birth child , number woman receive IVF treatment number men develop epididymitis . The hypothesis individual would test treated infection number long term fertility complication would decline intervention group compare control group .
